text:
Voodoo Manufacturing | Brooklyn, NY | https://voodoomfg.com/

- Marketing Director

- Manufacturing Director

Voodoo Manufacturing is a young startup on a big mission to change the way things are manufactured. With our 128-desktop 3D printer factory, we help companies bridge the gap between their first prototype and their first high volume production run (10,000+ units). We’ve worked with companies including Intel, Universal Studios, SyFy Channel, Autodesk, Viacom, Mattel, and a few more we can’t even talk about! We’ve unlocked an entirely new market in the world of manufacturing -- affordable high-volume 3D printing.

Email jobs@voodoomfg.com for more info.
